question: Who are Anglophones?
possible_answers: A. People who were taught English at school
B. People who understand but do not speak English
C. People who do not speak English as a first language
D. People who speak English as a first language
answer: D. People who speak English as a first language
explanatory_sentence: English speakers (Anglophones) and French speakers (Francophones) have lived together in partnership and creative tension for more than 300 years.
